snippet: Looking forward to a full training camp under Coach Mike Woodson, Carmelo Anthony on Monday offered to recruit players if the Knicks ask.
lead_paragraph: Looking forward to a full training camp under Coach Mike Woodson, Carmelo Anthony on Monday offered to recruit players if the Knicks ask.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Says He’ll Help Rebuild the Knicks
headline.main: Anthony Says He’ll Do His Part to Help Rebuild Knicks
headline.print_headline: Anthony Says He’ll Do His Part to Help Rebuild Knicks
